Title: Mock Nationals
Short Description: Competed in Accounting & Finance and networked.
Long Description: Annual ACE UTM Mock Nationals. As director of chapter development I assisted in organizing this event to develop delegates public speaking and confidence. | Over 50 delegates and judges enjoyed catered breakfast and lunch; alongside a keynote speaker from ICUBE - an on campus incubator at UofT. | Additionally, I was responsible for the moderation of case competitors.

Title: Ready Set Market!
Short Description: Hosted & organized a case competition of over 100 attendees (as seen above).
Long Description: Organizing and hosting the Ready Set Market! (RSM) case competition in collaboration with the Innovative Business Association at UofT was a rewarding experience. Promoting the event to over 1500 students, professors, and industry professionals was exhausting and fun! | On the event day, I was thrilled to reach an attendee count of 150. I enjoyed simply hosting & engaging with attendees; even making my way down the lunch queue to speak with everyone.
